lead_paragraph: In Cleveland, they recently unveiled a street sign for Charles Oakley. In New York, he has been estranged from the Knicks organization for years.

headline.print_headline: In Exile From the Knicks, but at Home in Cleveland
headline.main: In Exile From the Knicks, but Still at Home in Cleveland

snippet: In Cleveland, they recently unveiled a street sign for Charles Oakley. In New York, he has been estranged from the Knicks organization for years....
abstract: Former New York Knicks power forward Charles Oakley is estranged from franchise, in large part because of his refusal or inability to refrain from making caustic comments about team's front office, management and players; Oakley has found solace in his hometown of Cleveland, where street has been named in his honor.
